programme.title: THE TROJAN HEDGEHOG
programme.desc: The Guardians each come up with a gift for Maestra Saku’s birthday. A mysterious wooden hedgehog shows up as a gift, which proves to have Koto and Amkko inside! They attack the Magic Fort, but are thwarted by the Guardians when Xia bluffs about the dangers of his gift.

programme.title: Fleeting Beauty
programme.desc: A young girl forgets her toy Glam Salon at the library only to be discovered by Sarah and Iris. They open the salon for business to the excitement of some and the dismay of others.Their newfound joy is short-lived however. Will the Creepy Candy do the right thing and prove that true beauty comes from the heart? Check out this episode of Fleeting Beauty!

programme.title: Little Lost Dino
programme.desc: When Sneevil uses his newest contraption, the Dinocaller, he gets more than he hoped for. First, a small dinosaur who doesnt destroy the Smighties, but instead becomes Melodys pet, followed by his larger and angrier mommy and daddy dino.

programme.title: CHARMED, I SAY
programme.desc: Sundar is flipping through old film magazines in his break time when he hears a shriek from right outside the tea shop. Leaning out he sees a woman point at something just at the door. Chai Raja swoops out and in a deft move ensnares whatever it was in a rat-trap. He hands over the small harmless trap to Sundar. Sundar takes the trap and opens it only to find a small benign rattlesnake (female at that!) glide out. The female snake has a fixation on Sundar and follows him back to the hotel, causing havoc in the hotel. For once Sundar has an ally against Basha, but the obsessive snake is more a bane than a boon as Chai Raja is in danger of losing all its customers. Sundar must now tactfully rid the simpering snake off before he too is forced to slither out of the tea shop once and for all.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: Mysterious stranger_1
programme.desc: The stranger walks thru the old library, snapping pictures and making notes all the while mumbling incoherently under his breath, when He stops and rings a bell.he Creepy Candy decide to have the Hooligan J. Beans follow Mr. Dark into the bathroom. They hide and watch. as he goes to the sink and removes his glasses and looks in the mirror.

programme.title: Cuppa Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: Abracadabra
programme.desc: Keet is tired of Cat chasing her all the time. She finds a book in the attic on “Great magic tricks” and soon masters them. now its time to use them.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: TRING TRING
programme.desc: The days are getting busier at the hotel and the constant running around and hauling plates etc is getting to Sundar. He just wishes he could quickly finish up and snooze the rest of the time. After an especially hectic day of waiting/cleaning, Sundar cant believe his luck when he finds an old busted cycle near the backyard of the Hotel. With a little tinkering (taking parts out), Sundar manages to change it into a unicycle that will help him clean up and wait tables faster. What Sundar doesnt expect is that balancing on a unicycle can be quite a tricky issue he botches up the deliveries badly and Chai Raja orders him to get rid of the unicycle. Sundar does so with a heavy heart but imagine his surprise when the next day morning he wakes up to a familiar bell- its the unicycleits back and Basha is on it. What hurts more is that Chai Raja is encouraging it as Basha on the unicycle is helping amp up the customer flow. Sundar wants his unicycle back not only because he believes it should him getting the applause but also because the nifty Basha is using the unicycle performance as a faade to stealing fritters. Sundar and Basha have a showdown and Sundar getting carried away, performs with such a frenzy that ultimately he crashes the pantry down. The final shot is off Sundar cleaning up the mess wearing the cycle tire as a reluctant garland.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: VAMPIRE MOON
programme.desc: Buck goes to bed with a toothache and has a nightmare about being bitten by a vampire bat. When he awakes up he is convinced that he is turning into a vampire. At first the Creepy CandyTM try to explain to him that vampires are not real but when Buck begins acting strangely they start to wonder if could be true.

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: HOLI RE HOLI!!!
programme.desc: It is holi and Basha is in the mood to have some colourful fun. He comes in style to hotel Kelifornia with gulaal and pichkaris and literally baths the customers in colours. Sundar is having a crazy time trying to save the customers. And in that process he literally turns into a colourful canine himself. But things take a shocking turn when Basha targets Chai Raja in his holi attack. A shock-stricken Sundar takes out all his non-existent bravado to save an oblivious Chai Raja and doing that Sundar himself unexpectedly falls onto Chai Raja bathing him in gulaal! When everyone stares in silent shock, Chai Raja surprises all by happily bathing Sundar in gulaal! And it is officially holi!!!

programme.title: TROUBLE HAS WHEELS
programme.desc: Chai Raja is super angry at Sundar for being so slow at work! Sundar really needs to pull up his act. That is when he finds an abandoned skateboard behind the shop. Now Sundar is the fastest waiter ever. After some disastrous starting troubles, Sundar is efficiently skating through the teashop serving customers. For once Chai Raja is a little happy with him. Basha comes for his usual round of theft. And he is encountered by a speedy Sundar. Basha finds it hard to outrun Sundar-on-wheels. Basha needs to up his game right away! And he does so effectively. What follows is a crazy rolling marathon throughout the shop. How will it end?!!!

programme.title: The Grand Unveiling
programme.desc: Nino is busy with his artistic pebble sculptures, just when Charlie comes by to hand over a leaflet announcing the unveiling of Abra-Dabra’s new statue made by Mewmew for Mayor De Pfeffle. Sadly they find out Mewmew is totally undecided as to what he has to create in the first place and time is ticking by. Deedee is all too excited to take a peek to see what Mewmew has finally decided to make but it stopped by Nino. Finally Mewmew asks Deedee to enter the enclosed work-space, but not to see the sculpture which is fully covered, but to help move it to the town square. The sculpture is heavy and tiring that Deedee has a tough time getting it there. Mayor De Pfeffle announces the exhibit to be revealed in a couple of minutes and Mewmew rushes under the covering to add a few finishing touches. Mewmew’s symbolises the theme ‘happiness’ by creating a basket of carrots and proudly brushes it to shine more. But as he is there he overhears his friends whispering about things that make them happy like the magic wand for Deedee, a hammock for Charlie and so on. As none of them see carrots as a sign of happiness, Mewmew is in a hurry to make something that will mean happiness to everybody. Having made it Mewmew requests Deedee to magically get the sculpture to town square in a jiffy. Deedee conjures a swapping spell but it makes both the sculptures disappear. So Deedee and friends decide to pose under the sheet in a manner that resembles the happiness sculpture the closest. Mayor De Pfeffle is getting impatient that he removes the covering to reveal all the friends hugging each other trying to console a sad Mewmew. Mayor De Pfeffle is excited to see a living statue that epitomises happiness in a ‘hug’. The townsfolk take turns to use the statue space to express happiness in their own way, life-size.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A notorious robber has come to rob GrandPA’s house. He has with him a fancy paint and brush which can makes him blend seamlessly into anything.

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Low Memory
programme.desc: Sneevil gets amnesia and the Smighties take him on a camping adventure. They have a great time with him until he gets his memory back!

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: Catch the Wave
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: The Gingerbread Man
programme.desc: Old couple without a child bakes a gingerbread kid GoGo. GoGo escapes the oven, and runs away from the animals who try to eat him.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: Beach Fight
programme.desc: Its Dunky’s day off as he packs a small basket and heads to the beach .He starts making a sand castle and is very happy with it…

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Old Luggage
programme.desc: Packed with fun DIYs, Hepi and Briko tak us on an adventure!

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: The Mystery
programme.desc: Kala’s martial arts trophy has vanished – and ‘detective’ Gummy volunteers his services to unravel the mystery and track down the culprit.

programme.title: GAME OVER
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to climb a mountain and ring a bell. Seeing his henchmen distracted by an old videogame, Negu sends the game up to the Yan World to distract the Guardians. Xia and Pai become obsessed with the game, stealing it back and forth from each other.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: Sideways Day
programme.desc: Odessa learns to accept Pancake’s idea over her own when she joins the Zoonicorns in Sideways Day.Accepting other’s ideas even if they’re different from your own.

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: Prickly Pair
programme.desc: Nino is having a tough time trying to put his daisies up as desired to win the Wonderful Window Box competition that Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting. Deedee cheers him up by saying that flowers can be placed anywhere as long as it makes Abra-Dabra more beautiful. Just then Mewmew runs in all flustered and panicky. The problem seems to be that the creeper plant at Mewmew’s window hasn’t grown big enough to creep all around the heart-shaped support. But Deedee can’t help with magic, as it would be unfair in the competition against everyone else. Charlie loves his display but is being overprotective by shooing the twins away to play ball elsewhere. The twins accidentally throw the ball directly at Uncle Charlie’s display, knocking them all down and breaking them in the process. But there’s no time to fix them up without magic. Deedee brews a magic potion with a few ingredients. The magic potion makes all of Charlie’s flowers into cacti, something Charlie dislikes the most. Since Deedee feels she’s let Charlie down, they all decide to take theor very own flowers to replace Charlie’s exhibit. But with a sudden spelt of rain, all are damaged by the time they reach Charlie’s. But the rain has also caused the cacti to bloom, a rare sight indeed. Mayor De Pfeffle awards Uncle Charlie with the honour of being winner of the Wonderful Window Boz contest. But Charlie wants to share the award with all his friends

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: Magic Magic
programme.desc: Cat has to find new ways of catching Keet so as he sees the snake charmer on the street he gets a idea and quietly snatches away the flute of the charmer and runs back to the house to hypnotize Cat with it.

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: Everyone's good at something
programme.desc: The twins meet a little Snowgirl who lacks self-esteem but they help her discover a hidden skill which makes her the hit of the ‘North Pole’s Got Talent’ competition.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Pirates Ahoy!
programme.desc: Nardy is afraid to swim and Dude tries to teach him, but Nardy just doesnt seem to get it. It all comes together though when the Villains dressed as pirates steal the Water Stone. Nardy has to dive in and face his fears to save the day.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: A strange Footprint
programme.desc: Bubbles reads a story about scary monsters to Doubt and Caber. Duda finds her funny, but Caber is really scared. The next morning, Bubbles finds a giant footprint in the ground. Doubt and Caber thinks a monster did it, but Bubbles and Dad tell them that monsters dont exist. Hearing all the commotion about monsters, Scot decides to dress up as one and scare everyone for fun. When he tries to scare Duda, things dont go as planned. Instead of being afraid, Duda is excited to meet the "monster." Duda chases the "monster" up a tree, but soon discovers that he is just a Scotsman in disguise. Suddenly, something falls from the tree! Scot runs away, screaming that he is a real monster. Maybe monsters really exist...

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: Warqa, The Eggless Chicken
programme.desc: Aladdins favourite chicken has stopped laying eggs. His mother tells him to sell it at the market. The butcher at the market is rumoured to be a fearsome fellow. Jamillah and Aladdin cant bring themselves to sell Aladdins favourite chicken so they call on Genie to help Warqa lay eggs again. His spell works but soon shes hatching everything but eggs and the money from that helps to save Warqa from the butchers knife.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: The Darkside Of The Sun
programme.desc: When the sun goes out in the Zooniverse, Pancake learns to not be afraid of the dark. Let your imagination think happy things, not scary things.

programme.title: A Cold Crunch
programme.desc: It is freezing cold. Don is wrapped in a blanket when he notices a glow from the mouse’s hole. Wearing sunglasses and shorts, They have an orange coil burning right in the centre and its toasty and warm in there. Don has found a solution, he picks up the phone and orders for an electric blanket!

programme.title: It's Hard Being A Mommy
programme.desc: A baby duck comes out of its eggshell and the first thing it sees is Duda. So, he thinks Duda is his mom! Duda ends up taking care of the baby hoping his mother will come for him soon. But the baby duck is a handful and causes Duda quite a bit of trouble. Duda realizes that it is difficult to take care of a baby. The friends decide to go find the ducks real mother and leave the baby in Scots care. At first, Scot thinks that taking care of the baby is an easy job, but he quickly learns that it is not. Eventually, they find the babys real mother, and its time for Duda to say goodbye. Duda is sad to see the baby duck leaving..

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Talent Show
programme.desc: As Dunky warms up the milk in the morning he hears the “The Great Indian talent show” announcement coming to town. He’s all excited. He goes to his room , gets out his old song record disk - blows off the dust and puts it on the gramophone .

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: Love Deodorant
programme.desc: With the school’s formal dance coming up, Fred insists Friday should be able to do something to find him a love potion so Nora will be attracted to him. Brains catches Friday trying to keep up the charade.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: The Washed - Away Planet
programme.desc: Aladdin is entrusted to deliver a very precious necklace. When Jamillah arrives she knocks into him and out of worry for the necklace he opens the box but then it accidentally drops down a drain! He knows how expensive that necklace is, it would take him 20 years to earn enough to pay for it so he resigns himself to trying to find a job so that he can start earning the money back. Meanwhile Jamillah calls on Genie to help him get the necklace back and after some sifting around he finds it in the drain and Aladdin is able to deliver it on time.

programme.title: Let's Go Camping~
programme.desc: Friends are camping today. Sitting around the campfire, they decide to grill some sausages. Scot goes to look for them in their hiding place, but theyre not there! Friends believe that Scot is up to his old tricks and has hidden them for himself. They remind him of the last time he hid food... and it turns out that it was the same day the gang met Duda for the first time. Admitting that he wasnt the one eating the snacks he had hidden then, Scot begins to tell his friends what really happened that day. And it looks like a cute little mole that lives underground may have been the unwitting culprit.

programme.title: Prisionera citadina
programme.desc: Lena y Sergey esperan gemelos y pronto recibirán su nuevo apartamento, pero les espera un reto más.

programme.title: Las cabras curan
programme.desc: Por una seria enfermedad, Yana y su familia se mudan al campo para cambiar radicalmente su estilo de vida.

programme.title: La otra mujer
programme.desc: Ana y su marido tenían un matrimonio feliz, cuando ella se entera de que él tiene una amante

programme.title: La otra mujer

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Betty Boop- Whoops! I'm a Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop's runt of a suitor thinks he'll have better luck if he takes cowboy lessons at a dude ranch; slapstick results.

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.title: Often an Orphan 1949
programme.desc: Charlie Dog tries everything to get Porky to take him in and he finally does. After a couple pranks the dog pound ends up picking up Porky and not the dog.

programme.title: Play Safe -1936
programme.desc: A little boy jumps on a real train and learns a lesson about safety.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: The Trojan Horse 1960
programme.desc: During the Trojan War, the Greeks build a giant wooden horse as a stratagem to conquer the city of Troy. Adapted from the Greek myth.

programme.title: Secret Agent 1943
programme.desc: Superman battles saboteurs determined to stop a lady double agent from getting important documents to Washington D.C.

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Gold Rush Daze 1939
programme.desc: A man stops for gas on his way to dig for gold. The man at the station tells him what it was like back in 1849 in San Francisco, which we see. A sucker is hauled off the street and sat down at a card game; he dashes off as soon as someone shouts "they found gold in the hills" but others stake claims before he can. He ends up chopping off a cliff, falling down, and landing in the hospital. The doctor gives him news of another gold strike and he rushes out to begin panning. After some more mining gags and a song, we see a montage of more failed gold strikes. Back to the present day, where the storyteller claims to have sworn off gold, until a rider passes through with news of another strike, when he trades the station for the car and sets out after the gold.

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: Betty Boop and the Little King 1936
programme.desc: The Little King, comic strip character, meets Betty Boop.

programme.title: Spooking About Africa 1957
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command.

programme.title: Broom Stick Bunny 1956
programme.desc: Witch Hazel's claim to be the ugliest witch of all is threatened by a Halloween witch who turns out to be Bugs trick-or-treating.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Baby Be Good-1935
programme.desc: Betty Boop tells naughty Little Jimmy a corrective fairy tale (with herself as fairy). Part of the action is replayed in reverse.

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: Felix the Cat - Felix in Holly wood -1923
Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: Boo Moon
programme.desc: Casper emerges from a subway station, following a crowd of scared strangers. He encounters a man saying "see the wonders of the moon for ten cents," and offering a sight through a telescope. Casper scares the man away, then uses the telescope to see the moon. He then flies to the moon for a visit. Casper lands on the moon, disappointed to find no man on the moon. He lies down to nap, then tiny moon men emerge from holes. They capture Casper, like Lilliputians did to Gulliver, then place him in a cage on wheels, in which they tow him to the Ruler of the Moon, King Luna. The King addresses Casper as a monster, and treats him as an enemy. Casper playfully picks up King Luna, and the king has him placed in the royal dungeon. A dejected Casper is imprisoned. Then animated trees attack the city of the moon men. The moon men defend their fortified city with flaming missiles. The tree monsters fight back with water, then break through the town walls. When the fight seems lost to the tree monsters, Casper escapes his cage, and helps the moon men. Casper goes underground. The friendly ghost then pulls trees' parts through the moon surface and ties them together, immobilizing the trees. The frustrated trees writhe and strain against the knots Casper has tied. Casper and the moon men have won. Then, and only then, does King Luna embrace Casper as a friend. King Luna knights Casper for the valiant defense of his people. Then all the moon men join in singing the Casper theme song.

programme.title: Guest Adi Roy
programme.desc: Adi Roy talks about his starring role in Aladdin on Broadway.

programme.title: Guest Roy Wood Jr. - Toure Show, 2024
programme.desc: Roy Wood Jr. could have been the new host of the Daily Show. But instead, he left the show. Why would he walk away from a great job? Did he want to be the host? He goes into the whole story and tells us why leaving was way more empowering than staying. And much more.

programme.title: Filmmaker Nailah Jefferson speaks about her digital shorts series.
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Alexander Simone
programme.desc: Host Starr Rocque chats with Nina Simone's grandson, Alexander Simone, about new music, his family's legacy and more.

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - Plant-Based Healing, Juicing for Vitality, and The 120 Challenge
programme.desc: Dr. Scott Schreiber shares plant-based nutrition, Christian Evans makes smoothies, and Dr. Kevin Reese talks plant-based healing.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Chef AJ's Potato Pizza & "Cheese"cake
programme.desc: Chef AJ, creates an impressive Double Potato Panini Pizza that will spike your potato cravings and a decadent Strawberry Chocolate Cheesecake that will leave you begging for more.

programme.title: Jamaican Stuffed Sweet Potato
programme.desc: Gabrielle Reyes, aka One Great Vegan, makes magic with sweet potatoes! Sing it, girl! And, get more

programme.title: Infinity And Back
programme.desc: Infinity and Back is the story of one man's dream to stand on the very top of the world, Mt. Everest

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Frank Carrieri : Vegan Fruit Tart
programme.desc: Pastry chef, Frank Carrieri, rolls out vegan tart dough and mixes up vegan pastry cream to create jaw-dropping fruit tarts that are as good as gold.

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - Parties & Pizza... All Plant-Based
programme.desc: Nafsika interviews Demetrius Bagley of New York City's Vegan EatUP and a dynamic, young vegan chef.

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - Health & History
programme.desc: Health & history converge to reveal the advantages of a plant-based diet & its long history.

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Magnifique Montreal
programme.desc: Montreal is dripping with culture and cuisine and Eunice Reyes takes you on a dazzling food tour.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - "Meaty" Tower & Tofu Scramble
programme.desc: Restaurant owner Sarkis Vartanian joins Bodybuilders Korin Sutton and Ryan Nelson!

programme.title: Life in a Sanctuary
programme.desc: This unique film explores living in a sanctuary, from the animals' point of view.

programme.title: The Midnight Man
programme.desc: Hoping to fix their dysfunctional marriage, a couple travels to an isolated mountain cabin to work out their problems - but the one problem they didn't anticipate is the maniac trying to kill them...

programme.title: Alp
programme.desc: After a traumatic experience, Chris comes home to confront his past. but soon finds himself prey to a Demon who taunts him through sleep paralysis...

programme.title: Camp Massacre
programme.desc: Ten obese men appear on a competitive reality show geared toward weight-loss. As contestants disappear in the night it becomes apparent that a killer is on the loose...

programme.title: Jack y Jill: Las Colinas del Infierno
programme.desc: Tras buscar a su hija desaparecida, una dama y su grupo de búsqueda descubren la leyenda que se esconde tras la pareja asesina de Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Apuesta con la Muerte 2
programme.desc: Tras la captura de Carrillo y de su padre, Rogelio y Emilio asumen el mando del cartel. Ahora Carrillo recobró su libertad y quiere retomar el control. En busca del poder absoluto, se desatará una guerra sin cuartel que no respetará ningún límite.

programme.title: De Apellido Pesado
programme.desc: De Misión Texas son las hermanas Carrillo, heredaron el apellido que defenderán a toda costa. El Narcotráfico es el negocio de la familia que se expande a nuevos territorios, los carteles opuestos le piensan poner un alto a las Carrillo pero se tienen que atener a las consecuencias porque ellas son De Apellido pesado,

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: El Desertor
programme.desc: Luego de ser reclutado para el servicio militar y ante los abusos de su jefe inmediato, el Subteniente Montilla, Julián escapa del cuartel, lo que provoca una feroz persecución por parte de Montilla, quien se ha enamorado de Sagrario y hará todo lo posible para separar a los jóvenes.

programme.title: Cena Para Tres
programme.desc: Diego regresa a México después de dictar cátedra de arquitectura en Madrid y se encuentra con su antiguo amor, Carmen. Planea una cena para dos para despedir el año. Carmen asume que esa noche Diego le pedirá matrimonio pero la llegada inesperada de Valentina (su novia española) y la revelación del pasado secreto de Carmen cambiarán el destino de los personajes.

programme.title: Las Vegas Frankenstein
programme.desc: Después de un traumático accidente durante las vacaciones, cinco amigos cometen el error fatal de deshacerse del cuerpo de su víctima. Pero exactamente un año después, alguien o algo ha vuelto en busca de venganza y busca algo más que una disculpa.

programme.title: Bestia: Un Mounstro Entre Los Hombres
programme.desc: Cinco amigos se van de escapada a una cabaña aislada en las afueras del Bosque Nacional Six Rivers. Una discusión separa al grupo y las cosas comienzan a deteriorarse rápidamente. A medida que avanza la noche, aumentan las tensiones y es evidente que las cosas no son lo que parecen. La pregunta que cada hombre debe hacerse ahora es qué tan bien se conocen entre sí y qué tan bien se conocen realmente a sí mismos.

programme.title: La Mujer que Hablaba con Los Muertos
programme.desc: Es un film de Terror. Cuando Elena Castaño era una niña, tenía un don: era capaz de comunicarse con los espíritus de los muertos... pero esa capacidad desapareció al crecer. Ahora, Elena y su hermana Úrsula viven de las rentas del pasado, organizando falsas sesiones de espiritismo en las que embaucan a los incautos. Elena, harta de esa vida, ha decidido que esta noche celebrará su última sesión. Todo está dispuesto, solo que hay un invitado de más... un invitado al que nadie esperaba. A la hora de afrontar la historia, hemos tenido en cuenta miles de filias: desde los cuentos de fantasmas de M.R. James hasta "Diez Negritos”, de Agatha Christie, pasando por “Posesión Infernal”, “La Trama” (la de Hitchcock, claro) o “En Bandeja de Plata”, de Billy Wilder. La idea era hacer un largometraje con el que la gente se divierta pasando miedo. Que se rían justo antes de saltar del susto, para después volver a reírse.

programme.title: Plot Hole

programme.title: Source Material

programme.title: Places Everyone!

programme.title: Cutting Room
